title: 96/459/EC: Commission Decision of 4 July 1996 amending Decision 95/30/EC laying down specific conditions for importing fishery products from Morocco (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 4 July 1996 amending Decision 95/30/EC laying down specific conditions for importing fishery products from Morocco (Text with EEA relevance) (96/459/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex B to Decision 95/30/EC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 July 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 15.
(2) OJ No L 42, 24. 2. 1995, p. 32.
(3) OJ No L 8, 11. 1. 1990, p. 70.
ANNEX
'ANNEX B
LIST OF APPROVED ESTABLISHMENTS
